casebody.data:
In re Complaint of Allied Erecting & Dismantling Co., Inc.
v.
Ohio Edison Co. 2014-0008 Supreme Court of Ohio. July 24, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

On May 11, 2016, this court stayed these proceedings pending resolution of federal bankruptcy proceedings. Sua sponte, the court orders the parties to notify the court within 14 days whether the federal bankruptcy proceedings have concluded and this case can proceed.
